import math
a=[1,3,7,15,31,63,127,255,511,1023,2047,4095,8191,16383,32767,65535,131071,262143,524287,1048575,2097151,4194303,8388607,16777215,33554431,67108863,134217727,268435455,536870911,1073741823]
for _ in range(input()):
	n=int(input())
	if n==1:
		print '2'
	elif n in a:
		print int(((math.pow(2,a.index(n)))-1))
	else:
		print '-1'
